com.xorprogramming.wallpaper

Class ThreadedWallpaperService.ThreadedEngine<T extends WallpaperScene>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.service.wallpaper.WallpaperService.Engine
      • com.xorprogramming.wallpaper.ThreadedWallpaperService.ThreadedEngine<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of WallpaperScene
    Enclosing class:
    ThreadedWallpaperService

    public abstract class ThreadedWallpaperService.ThreadedEngine<T extends WallpaperScene>
extends android.service.wallpaper.WallpaperService.Engine
    Handles the rendering of a WallpaperScene and threading required to update it. The scene is only updated when the live wallpaper can be seen by a user. Note that the ThreadedEngine runs on a non-UI thread. Thus, any interaction in a WallpaperScene by the UI thread with fields used in the render and update methods must be synchronized.
    Version:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    Steven Roberts
    See Also:
    WallpaperScene, ThreadedWallpaperService

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThreadedWallpaperService.ThreadedEngine

        public ThreadedWallpaperService.ThreadedEngine(T scene,
                                       float targetFPS)
        Create a new ThreadedEngine object.
        Parameters:
        scene - The WallpaperScene for the live wallpaper
        targetFPS - The number of thread updates every second. It must be a positive number or UpdaterThread.MAX_UPS, which prevents the thread from sleeping or yielding.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the WallpaperScene is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If targetUPS is not a positive number or UpdaterThread.MAX_UPS
